commands.name: get
commands.description: Displays information on a given player's character.

optional.name: player
description: Player to get the character for if not looking for the character of the author

commands.name: create
commands.description: Creates a channel category, two channels, and role for the adventure

commands.name: dm_add
commands.description: Adds a DM to an adventure

commands.name: dm_remove
commands.description: Removes a DM from an adventure. This command will fail if there is only 1 DM for the adventure

commands.name: add
commands.description: Adds a player or players to an adventure

optional.name: calc_tier
description: Whether to recalculate the adventure tier on player add.
Default is True. This is here in case we are re-adding a player's playing at a lower level, but we don't
want to use their current character level in the adventure tier calculations

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes a player from an adventure

commands.name: close
commands.description: Closes and adventure and removes roles from players

optional.name: role
description: Role for the adventure, if not ran in one of the Adventure channels

commands.name: status
commands.description: Displays the current status of an Adventure

optional.name: role
description: Role for the adventure, if not ran in one fo the adventure channels.

category.name: Room
category.description: Tools for DM's to manage channels within their adventure without having manage server permissions

commands.name: add_room
commands.description: Adds a channel with the given name to the Adventure category

commands.name: rename
commands.description: Renames the channel the command was run in

commands.name: view
commands.description: Hides or reveals the room to the @Quester role

commands.name: move
commands.description: Shuffles the current channel around in the Adventure category

commands.name: claim
commands.description: Opens an arena in the current channel and sets the user as the host

commands.name: status
commands.description: Re-posts the arena status embed if scrolling or checking pins is too hard

commands.name: add
commands.description: Manually adds a player to the arena if they forgot to click the button...which they do....a lot

commands.name: remove
commands.description: Removes a player from the arena

commands.name: phase
commands.description: Logs the outcome of an arena phase

commands.name: close
commands.description: Manually closes an arena

commands.name: create
commands.description: Creates a new character for a given player

optional.name: character_subrace
description: Subrace for a character if applicable

optional.name: character_subclass
description: Subclass for a character if applicable

optional.name: level
description: Starting level if starting above level 1

commands.name: level
commands.description: Manually levels a character once they have completed their level 1 or 2 questions and their sheet has been approved.

commands.name: race
commands.description: Sets or updates a characters race/subrace

commands.name: subclass
commands.description: Sets the subclass for a given player and class

optional.name: character_subclass
description: Subclass for a character if applicable

commands.name: add_multiclass
commands.description: Adds a new class/multiclass to a Character

optional.name: character_subclass
description: Subclass for a character if applicable

commands.name: remove_multiclass
commands.description: Removes a class/multiclass from a player

commands.name: inactivate
commands.description: Flags a player's Character as inactive
